mapper.select: select id, username, password, birth_date, nickname, email, github, qq, wecaht, avatar, gmt_create, gmt_modified, hobby, motto, md_info from admin_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into admin_user( id, username, password, birth_date, nickname, email, github, qq, wecaht, avatar, gmt_create, gmt_modified, hobby, motto, md_info) values (seq_admin_user.nextval,#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{github,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wecaht,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,sysdate,#{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{motto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mdInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select id, username, password, birth_date, nickname, email, github, qq, wecaht, avatar, gmt_create, gmt_modified, hobby, motto, md_info from admin_user where
#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert all
into admin_user( id, username, password, birth_date, nickname, email, github, qq, wecaht, avatar, gmt_create, gmt_modified, hobby, motto, md_info) values (#{item.id},#{item.username},#{item.password},#{item.birthDate},#{item.nickname},#{item.email},#{item.github},#{item.qq},#{item.wecaht},#{item.avatar},sysdate,sysdate,#{item.hobby},#{item.motto},#{item.md_info})
